attributes.title: Will not be voting for Trump
attributes.review: First things first ,I opened the app and I saw a naked picture of Trump and I was traumatized and I put in the email password and a week later I saw that 10,000 dollars was stolen from my account and I thought it was something else so looked more into the app and I tried to get a way to vote for Trump and I voted well I thought I voted but they all had taken all money in my bank and I tried to delete the app but I received a threat from Trump and I will not be voting for Trump and I think this app should be deleted

attributes.title: So laggy!
attributes.review: This is honestly the worst app I have ever downloaded. It crashed the entire time I attempted to use it. It seems like a child designed it, extremely hard to use and so laggy it was just impossible to do anything. I’m surprised this is still on the app store, considering it has been upsetting many people that it is still here. Shocked that anyone would leave a review higher than 1 star, if I could do lower I 100% would. Not recommended at all. Please take this piece of garbage off the app store.

attributes.title: 🍊✨HORRIBLE✨🍊
attributes.review: It took a week to download and all I was trying to do was support our amazing Orange! When you first open the app it will ask you questions such as what’s you gender, the options were male or female there was no other😡! I started to realize that potatoes would fly around my room saying trump2020 and my TV would keep falling off my wall! And this was all because of the trump app! Another thing I noticed was that at 1:00 pm everyday it would start raining oranges and orange juice!! This is a HORRIBLE app! I do not recommend!

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I gotta say they need to work on their graphics. There was this creepy guy in all the images. Also their slogan needs work. “Make America great again” do tell me when America was great. Was it during slavery or maybe the Great Depression. I do forget sometimes. Plus the people running this app seem to think that they are above people who look or live differently than them and that these people don’t deserve human rights which is frankly an idiotic idea. All and all I do not appreciate this app!

attributes.title: ✨revolting✨
attributes.review: I thought I downloaded Subway Surfers but then I come to realize a giant orange beast was on my screen!😱😱!!! I was like “how did I get here?” And I realized I had been POSSESSED!🤬😭😥🥶🤯🤫😨?!?!?DONALD TRUMP POSSESSED ME TO DOWNLOAD THE APP BUT DON’T WORRY I WAS STRONG ENOUGH TO SNAP OUT OF IT BEFORE ANYTHING BAD HAPPENED. Next thing I know, my whole family has downloaded the app?!?! I ask them to delete it and they just stare at me blankly saying “bring back the 19th amendment” in a Donald trump voice!!!!! 🤯😓😱😐🥶🤗😭🤫!!?!?! I finally snapped them out of it thank GOSH!!! DON’T download this app! It’s for your own good...🤭😬😑😯😣🤥😠😥🤯🤬😐🥶🤔😟😥😡🙄😳🤭🤬🤫😤😐

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review:
donald trump diss track: trumps a dump 

little trump with your racist mouth talking smack. pulling up with the trump train about to get stopped in it’s tracks. people call the narcissist their president and i find that kind of funny. is building a wall really how you want to spend your money? 

your spray tans make you look orange, that’s getting out of hand. what was it you were going for, tangerine or tan? you don’t work out and that is very evident. cause the only running you do is for president. 

you put little kids in cages, yeah i have that charted. and why does every facial expression look like someone just farted? should have been impeached, yet you still stay. but you will never be my president at the end of the day. 

your slogan says to “make america great again”. when you are out of office, it will be the best it’s ever been. and to think that some people don’t deserve rights, that’s where you are wrong. it’s been 4 years with this clownery, that’s way too long. 

you put little kids in cages, yeah i have that charted. and why does every facial expression look like someone just farted? should have been impeached, yet you still stay. but you will never be my president at the end of the day.

attributes.title: WORST app I have ever gotten
attributes.review: I downloaded the app in hopes of learning more about trumps campaign but the just doesn’t work! The app kept crashing no matter how many times I refreshed it. I even restarted my phone and the app STILL didn’t work. When the app would work , the information on there was not to my liking. Overall I do not feel that this app did its job of informing me about trumps campaign. I would rather just look up information online than have this app. The app is terrible and useless.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!
attributes.review: Right as I opened this app, I was prompted with a horrifying image of a man placing his erect penis inside of a porcupine. I do not even understand the schematics or rationale behind that but I digress. Under “About Us,” there was a section that said “Stan Lil Huddy for Clear Skin🥰🇺🇸 (Sign the Petition Below to Cancel Charli)”. Ridiculous! There was even one feature that was enabled that allowed the app to continuously play Nickelback on my phone and there was no way to stop it unless I allowed the phone to self-destruct. Now I have a new phone. The Trump Administration owes me a new phone.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to show my support for our president and I was EXTREMELY disappointed. It always crashes and makes my phone glitch and shut of when I open it. I think it’s causing a virus on my phone which mean I have to go pay for it to be fixed. WORST APP EVER. Don’t download it even if you want to show your support or be updated it’s not worth the money you’ll hav two spend because of this app. Also a lot of fake info and lies on this app. What should I have expected though right?

attributes.title: this app took all my personal info 😾😾
attributes.review: i was just going throughout my day, as usual when i saw this app. i thought it would be interesting to download, so i did. everything wad fine until i noticed that my phone was acting strange and a bunch of viruses were popping up. i later went to a store to get it fixed because it wasn’t stopping. i found out that it was all because of the trump app and that it was stealing my personal data and information! do not download this app, i repeat, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!
